title: Ready-to-use office in the heart of Ngamwongwan, convenient access, fully equipped with all amenities.
description: Address: 50, Soi Ngamwongwan 57, Lat Yao Subdistrict, Chatuchak District, Bangkok 10900
promp:
Office space for rent in the Ngamwongwan area

Boost your business in a prime location at the heart of Ngamwongwan. This 9-storey building offers a wide range of rental spaces suitable for offices and various types of businesses.

Project Highlights:

- Prime location on Ngamwongwan Road, near The Mall Ngamwongwan and expressway access
- 9-storey building with a passenger elevator
- Rental spaces starting from 30 sq.m. and up
- Full facilities: parking, security system, air conditioning, ready-to-use electricity and water
- Easy access via private car and public transportation
